sentences.sentence: In it the majority of students will have conformed to the standard model of the time: male, middle class and Western.
sentences.translation: 其中大多数学生将是符合那个时代标准模式的：男性、中产阶级、西方人。

sentences.sentence: He conformed the plans to the new specifications.
sentences.translation: 他使各项计划都符合新的规格要求。

sentences.sentence: He also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his son.
sentences.translation: 他也预先命中注定适合他儿子的形象。
